  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BrightnessLevel
    A brightness level has three values: light output, photocell down threshold and photocell up threshold.
    BrightnessTable
    This encapsulates a DMS brightness table and allows it to be adjusted with feedbask samples from DMSImpl.BrightnessHandler.
    CRCStream
    This is an implementation of the CRC-16 algorithm described in ISO/IEC standard 3309.
    HDLC
    This is an implementation of the ISO/IEC standard 3309 High-level Data Link Control (HDLC) protocol, or rather, the subset of it which is described in NEMA TS 3.3-1996 (NTCIP Class B profile).
    HDLC.AddressedInputStream
    A FilterInputStream which is tied to a specific HDLC address.
    HDLC.AddressedOutputStream
    A FilterOutputStream which is tied to a specific HDLC address.
    HDLC.FrameInputStream
    A FilterInputStream which reads messages framed with a FLAG octet and performs a transparency technique to collapse ESCAPE sequences into single octets.
    HDLC.FrameOutputStream
    A FilterOutputStream which frames messages with a FLAG octet and performs a transparency technique to ensure the FLAG is not contained within the frame.
    HDLCMessenger
    HDLC Messenger
    NtcipPoller
    NTCIP Poller
    NtcipThread
    NTCIP thread
    OpDMS
    Operation to be performed on a dynamic message sign
    OpEss
    Operation performed on an ESS
    OpLCS
    An LCS array operation.
    OpNtcip
    Operation for NTCIP device.
    OpQueryAlarm
    Operation to query an alarm.
    OpQueryDMSConfiguration
    Operation to query the configuration of a DMS.
    OpQueryDMSFonts
    Operation to query all fonts on a DMS controller.
    OpQueryDMSGraphics
    Operation to query graphics on a DMS.
    OpQueryDMSMessage
    Operation to query the current message on a DMS.
    OpQueryDMSStatus
    This operation queries the status of a DMS.
    OpQueryEssSettings
    Operation to query a weather sensor's settings.
    OpQueryEssStatus
    Operation to query the status of a weather sensor.
    OpQueryGpsLocation
    Operation to query the GPS location.
    OpQueryLCSIndications
    Operation to query indicaitons on a Lane Control Signal array.
    OpQueryModules
    Operation to query the hardware/software modules.
    OpQuerySamples
    This operation queries sample data.
    OpQuerySystem
    Operation to query system values.
    OpResetDMS
    Operatoin to reset a dynamic message sign.
    OpSendDMSDefaults
    Operation to send default parameters to a DMS.
    OpSendDMSFonts
    Operation to send a set of fonts to a DMS controller.
    OpSendDMSMessage
    Operation to send a message to a DMS and activate it.
    OpSendLCSIndications
    Operation to send new indicaitons to a Lane Control Signal array.
    OpSendLCSSettings
    Operation to send settings to a Lane Control Signal array.
    OpSyncTime
    Operation to synchronize the clock time.
    OpTestComm
    This operation tests communication.
    OpTestDMSPixels
    This operation tests the pixel status of a DMS.
    OpUpdateDMSBrightness
    Operation to incorporate brightness feedback for a DMS.
    OpUpdateDMSDuration
    Operation to update the duration of the current DMS message.
